nodes.text: Oh boy, I get to be the one that's in charge here.
Wow, I never thought such a beautiful woman would try to seduce me. What! You’re not a woman! Don’t worry, you’re so pretty, I won’t say anything if you won’t.
Hi! My name’s Davin; I help my father run the slaughterhouse in Modoc.
Come back and see me if you want to… talk again.
Sure, I’m not busy. Ask away.
I need a little space, Davin.
I need a little space, Davin.
Well, I uh… I mean, I… I supervise and take care of stuff. I’m the owner’s son after all. I’m going to inherit this place when my dad kicks off.
It’s a lie. I only go out to the barn at night to a… make sure everything is locked up. You know, with all the wild animals around and all.
I knew you’d come back to me.
Dad runs the slaughterhouse. He’s OK as far as fathers go. A word of advice if you do any business with him. There’s usually more to his business deals than he lets on.

links.text: There must be some mistake; I just wanted to ask you some questions.
Stop talking; you’re gonna ruin it for the both of us. Just sit back and enjoy.
Thanks for the offer, but no. Uhhh... I'll be leaving now.
I hear rumors about you and the brahmin.
I’m looking for Cornelius’s gold watch. Have you seen it anywhere?
Tell me about your dad.
What do you do at the slaughterhouse?
I have to go. Bye.
I hear rumors about you and the brahmin.
I’m looking for Cornelius’s gold watch. Have you seen it anywhere?
Tell me about your dad.
What do you do at the slaughterhouse?
Why don’t we get more comfortable?
I have to go. Bye.
Can I ask you a few more questions?
Can I ask you a few more questions?
Can I ask you a few more questions?
I’m looking for Cornelius’s gold watch. Have you seen it anywhere?
Tell me about your dad.
What do you do at the slaughterhouse?
I have to go. Bye.
Why don’t we get more comfortable?
I hear rumors about you and the brahmin.
Can I ask you a few more questions?
